title: Oathblood
description: A collection of short stories from the Tarma & Kethry tales... now if we could find the stories that appeared in Fantasy Book..."Sword Sworn""Turnabout""A Tale of Heroes""Keys""The Making of a Legend""The Talisman""Wings of Fire""A Woman's Weapon""Friendly Fire""Spring Plowing at Forst Reach""Oathblood"
author: Mercedes Lackey
